Desc.entry: A registered charity project which aims to engage with families, carers, parents and children in Attercliffe and Darnall according to their need. Enables clients to work in a solution focused way to move on and make changes. Has links to statutory and voluntary services and runs introductory courses through to NVQ. Self or any referral.

ContactName.entry: Marie Johnson/Nadem Khan, Admin/Jo-anne Van Levesley, Project Manager

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Please contact for details for an up to date list of courses, groups and trips available
